jobDescription: Job Title: Vice President, General Counsel Location:USExternal Description:Job Title: Vice President & General CounselSupport.com, Inc. (NASDAQ: SPRT) is a leading provider of tech support and turnkey support center services, producer of SUPERAntiSpyware® anti-malware products, and the maker of Support.com® software. Support.com services and products help leading brands deepen their customer relationships. Customers want technology that works the way it's intended. By using Support.com services and software, companies can deliver a fantastic customer experience, leading to happier customers, greater brand loyalty and growing revenues.  The Vice President & General Counsel will handle all legal issues affecting Support.com. The General Counsel will report directly to the Company's President and CEO, and provide the legal viewpoint to our decision-making process. This role will also serve as the Company's Secretary. The General Counsel will consult with and retain outside counsel as needed for litigation, and other specialized matters. manage subsidiary compliance and maintenance of corporate records, including international and domestic company board and shareholder materials; create and maintain corporate records databases; coordinate and perform day-to-day activities relating to corporate governance and filings; assist in mergers and acquisitions-related matters; and support efforts to prepare for meetings and requirements of the Board of Directors and Committees. Compliance: Support company compliance initiatives and training programs; act as Records Coordinator and maintain and update legal record retention requirements in support of the corporate Secretary; and assist in the implementation, training, and maintenance of the compliance related policies, processes and procedures as needed.
